customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Channel shortlinking - ~ not autocomplete
————————————————————————————
1. Type "~" followed by a PUBLIC channel name. Do not select an auto-complete result; type the channel name out manually
2. Type a space, then some additional text
3. Press Enter
inline.expectedResult: If the channel name has a space in it, the message should not contain a channel link (e.g. just "~town square is fun", nothing linked). If no space, it should link. Autocomplete should stop trying to offer options as soon as the string matches no channels.
